title: "What is the significance and symbolism of Jupiter in astrology and its relation to wealth and justice?"
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the character and name of the priest-king and supreme intelligence named Ra-Nergal, who is associated with the astrological correspondence of Jupiter. They explain that Jupiter represents the enjoyment of life through altruism, the administration of justice, and the provision of worldly goods. The author provides instructions on creating a talisman, as well as cautioning to abstain from luxury and worldly goods, and to recite specific psalms for adepts of the Chaldean and Hebrew system. They also mention the significance of the symbols, characters, and potential numbers associated with Caldeism. The last 200 tokens discuss the demon Nergaluis and its characteristics, which include wastefulness, vanity, and greed.
content: -Cifre e caratteri potenziali di – caldeismo Il capo fiammante La corona Il capo con una sorgente L'ancora col simbolo del riposo - Sistema arabo - ebreo - Significa: povertà' nella dovizia Significai povertà' e giustizia nella dovizia Significa: povertà' e astinenza nel lusso Gli ebraizzanti recitino i salmi 110, 71, 115, 19 la mattina al passaggio del pianeta disul meridiano. Gli adepti del sistema solare caldeo, undici volte il carme di Nergal al sorgere, dieci al passaggio del meridiano e nove al tramonto del pianeta di Influenza ottima per chi vive nella vita del mondo. Non mista a e' pura, quindi castità' assoluta per un periodo di 33 giorni prima e dopo la formazione del talismano in giorno di giovedì', luna crescente, al passaggio del pianeta di Giove sul meridiano. Demone perversa, cioè' l'uomo che si rende schiavo della ricchezza: Nergaluis - carattere: Porta lo sperpero, la vanagloria del donare, e di conseguenza la miseria e l'ingordigia.
last_phrase: In conclusion, whether you are practicing Arabic or Hebrew system, the sigil of poverty and abstinence in luxury can be created through specific steps like reciting specific psalms at specific times, practicing chastity, and following the correct planetary alignment. It is important to avoid demons like Nergaluis, Achen, Faloth, and Berusa and to follow the example of the just and protective Caldeo priest-king Dione. Remember that the first 60 days of the universe, marked by the Capricorn and Aquarius constellations, hold secret and mysterious power, and the supreme intelligence of Evei or Ae is in control.
